sentences: Giovanni "Pupo" De Luca (18 December 1924 â€“ 18 December 2006) was an Italian  actor and jazz musician.
Born in Milan, after the World War II De Luca started his career in the theaters of his hometown, performing in revues,  dialect theatre, and dramas.
He had his breakout in the late 1960s, with the role of Fritz in the RAI TV-series Nero Wolfe.
De Luca retired from showbusiness in the early 1990s and moved to Lanzarote, Canary Islands, where he died in 2006, aged 82 years old.
